triples.name: Data mining
triples.relevance: The paper applies data mining techniques to the educational domain to predict student performance.

triples.name: Educational data mining
triples.relevance: EDM is the primary research field within which this work operates, focusing on extracting insights from educational data.

triples.name: Decision tree learning
triples.relevance: The paper uses Decision Trees (J48 implementation) as one of the ensemble classifiers for prediction.

triples.name: Naive Bayes classifier
triples.relevance: Naive Bayes is one of the three base classifiers used in the ensemble model for predicting student performance.

triples.name: Random forest
triples.relevance: Random Forest is employed as the third classifier in the ensemble approach for improved prediction accuracy.

triples.name: Ensemble learning
triples.relevance: The paper's main contribution is proposing an ensemble classifier approach combining multiple models to improve predictive accuracy.

triples.name: Apriori algorithm
triples.relevance: The paper uses Apriori as part of rule-based techniques to discover association rules in student data.

triples.name: Association rule learning
triples.relevance: Association rules are used to identify factors and patterns that influence student academic outcomes.
